subGroups.title: CCSS Math 2.G.A.3
subGroups.description: Partition circles and rectangles into two, three, or four equal shares, describe the shares using the words halves, thirds, half of, a third of, etc., and describe the whole as two halves, three thirds, four fourths. Recognize that equal shares of identical wholes need not have the same shape.

items.id: Badges of Gameplay, Equal Sharing & Slicing!
items.title: Badges of Gameplay, Equal Sharing & Slicing!
items.info: Students understand how the game works and can split groups or shapes into equal shares.

subGroups.title: CCSS Math 3.NF.A.1
subGroups.description: Understand a fraction 1/b as the quantity formed by 1 part when a whole is partitioned into b equal parts; understand a fraction a/b as the quantity formed by a parts of size 1/b.

items.id: Badges of the Denominator, Numerator & Circles!
items.title: Badges of the Denominator, Numerator & Circles!
items.info: Students understand what changing the numerator and the denominator mean in a fraction.

subGroups.title: CCSS Math 3.NF.A.3
subGroups.description: Recognize simple equivalent fractions, e.g., 1/2 = 2/4, 4/6 = 2/3 and can compare different fractions by reasoning about their size.

items.id: Badges of Size Comparison, Equivalent Fractions and Advanced Equivalent Fractions!
items.title: Badges of Size Comparison, Equivalent Fractions and Advanced Equivalent Fractions!
items.info: Students understand what an equivalent fraction is, by comparing shapes of different sizes together.

items.id: Badges of Fractions Ordering & Question Marks!
items.title: Badges of Fractions Ordering & Question Marks!
items.info: Students can deduct fraction values based on the information at hand.

subGroups.title: CCSS Math 3.NF.B.3
subGroups.description: Understand subtraction of fractions as separating parts referring to the same whole.
